issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

comments.body:
Attach the failure-reproduce patch and failure log. 
Some notes: 
* Since my local env is Windows, I can't use {{DataNodeTestUtils.injectDataDirFailure}} for test. Instead of that, I make a minor change in my test.
* Using {{thread.sleep}} to delay the wait replication operation.
Attach a patch to fix this. Kindly review,

| (x) *{color:red}-1 overall{color}* |

This message was automatically generated.

Hi [~linyiqun],

Thanks for reporting this. I looked at the patch and have one questions: for the reproducing patch, is there a reason why we have to add a new {{injectDataDirFailure}}, instead of just using {{DataNodeTestUtils.injectDataDirFailure}} to reproduce the error? Because if the issue is that the file gets re-replicated and the count {{underReplicatedBlocks}} becomes 0, then the error should still happen with {{DataNodeTestUtils.injectDataDirFailure}} right?

In addition, I applied the reproduce patch, than applied the fix, the test still fails, due to a different error. 
{{impl.FsDatasetImpl (FsVolumeList.java:waitVolumeRemoved(275)) - Thread interrupted when waiting for volume reference to be released.}}.

| (x) *{color:red}-1 overall{color}* |

bq. actually this test will be skipped under Windows, There is a check assumeNotWindows(); in each test method.

I just checked, the one is failing consistently for us is {{TestDataNodeVolumeFailure#testVolumeFailure()}}.
For the ones that are disabled, it was done in HDFS-8309.
We will open a separate JIRA for this.

Regarding the fix in [^HDFS-11398.002.patch] in particular, you made it from 2 to 1 failures.
What's the rationale here? It looks like we are changing a little what's tested here.
Can we keep failing both DNs?

A minor nit, I would extract the dn0 and vol into a variable to make it easier to read.
Found the same test failure inHDFS-10240 precommit job.
